title: Give and Take
detail_text: <:th_ch0204/>….Ai, are you nervous?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Eh!? It’s because Ai never really went to these adult-like restaurants. Ai thought that Ai need to behave<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Fufu, you’re overthinking it. You can’t taste the food if you’re like that, no?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>That’s a different thing, so it’s fine! Delicious foods are delicious no matter if you’re nervous or not♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>That’s good to hear<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Hey, when we get out of here, do you want to go for some Taiyaki? Ai know a place near Ai’s home that’s really delicious<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>….as I thought, aren’t you forcing yourself? Should we get out?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Ah, sorry! Ai didn’t mean it like that! You took Ai to a great place, so Ai figured that Ai should take you to one of Ai’s recommendation too<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Eeh!? You don’t really need to worry about that though….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Ehehe, Ai wants to hang out with Karin after the food too!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Then just say so…. Fufu, I’ll look forward to the Taiyaki. But would we even have room for it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Then let’s each have half!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
